name: Fermín Romero de Torres
description: Fermín Romero de Torres – Sidekick, friend, and mentor of Daniel Sempere

name: Francisco Javier Fumero
description: Francisco Javier Fumero – The main antagonist

name: Daniel Sempere Martín
description: Daniel Sempere Martín (later in the tetralogy referred to as Daniel Sempere Gispert) – The main character of the story

name: Father Fernando Ramos
description: Father Fernando Ramos – A schoolboy friend of Julián Carax who later becomes a priest at their old school

name: Don Gustavo Barceló
description: Don Gustavo Barceló – Friend of Daniel and his father

name: Penélope Aldaya
description: Penélope Aldaya – An ethereal beauty, devoid of anything worldly, she is described as an angel of light

name: Jacinta Coronado
description: Jacinta Coronado – The devoted former governess of Penélope Aldaya, now living in a retirement home

name: Beatriz Aguilar
description: Beatriz Aguilar – Love interest of Daniel Sempere and sister of Tomás

name: Tomás Aguilar
description: Tomás Aguilar – Best friend of Daniel Sempere

name: Clara Barceló
description: Clara Barceló – Niece of the wealthy Don Gustavo Barceló, very beautiful, yet blind

name: Miquel Moliner
description: Miquel Moliner – A schoolboy friend of Julián Carax, fun-loving and loyal

name: Julián Carax
description: Julián Carax – The author of The Shadow of the Wind

name: Nuria Monfort
description: Nuria Monfort – An intelligent femme fatale who worked at the publishing house where Julián's books were published

name: Jorge Aldaya
description: Jorge Aldaya – A schoolboy friend of Julián Carax, sometimes rather moody, very wealthy
